entry.title: Advent Calendars For Web Designers And Developers (December 2021 Edition)

From [festive](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2016/12/freebie-christmas-advent-icon-set-25-icons-ai-eps-svg-png-pdf/) [icon](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2015/12/freebie-christmas-icons-illustrations/) [sets](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2014/11/freebie-christmas-icon-set-ai-psd-eps-pdf-svg-png/) to advent calendars that are bound to sweeten your days with a delightful little surprise each morning, we’ve decided to join in on this lovely annual tradition and bring it all to one place. So prepare yourself a nice cup of coffee and get cozy — there’s always something new to learn and discover!

entry.title: Adding A Dyslexia-Friendly Mode To A Website

entry.title: Improving The Performance Of Wix Websites (Case Study)

entry.title: Next.js Wildcard Subdomains
entry.summary: Hosting with a wildcard subdomain enables your users to visit your site on any subdomain of your domain (*.example.com), and as you can imagine, we can use this to create unique user experiences which we’ll be exploring in this article through a Next.js lens.

If there’s a useful one that hasn’t been mentioned and one you use regularly, please do share it in the comments.
